The user manifests ten fire balls in a circle in front of them and launches them with their hand motions.

== Trivia ==
* [[wikipedia:Kitsunebi|Kitsunebi]] are fires made in Japanese mythology often said to be made by [[wikipedia:Kitsune|kitsune]].
